segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful through that window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a nice contrast to the chaos inside this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids are being sneaky, but I can’t blame them for wanting cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing so precariously; it’s almost impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just absurd in the best way.
segments.speaker: PAR
